trans-unit.source: This guide explains how to use <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> in a multiple-client environment. It also provides information that a server administrator might need to keep <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> running with a high level of performance and reliability in a server framework or in a multiple-client application server environment.

seg-source.mrk: This guide explains how to use <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> in a multiple-client environment.

It also provides information that a server administrator might need to keep <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> running with a high level of performance and reliability in a server framework or in a multiple-client application server environment.

target.mrk: This guide explains how to use <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> in a multiple-client environment.

It also provides information that a server administrator might need to keep <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> running with a high level of performance and reliability in a server framework or in a multiple-client application server environment.

trans-unit.source: When running in embedded mode, <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> databases typically do not need any administration.

seg-source.mrk: When running in embedded mode, <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> databases typically do not need any administration.

target.mrk: When running in embedded mode, <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> databases typically do not need any administration.

trans-unit.source: To connect multiple clients with <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph>, you can embed <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> in a server framework that you choose, or you can use the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> Network Server. This guide describes these options.

seg-source.mrk: To connect multiple clients with <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph>, you can embed <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> in a server framework that you choose, or you can use the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> Network Server.

target.mrk: To connect multiple clients with <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph>, you can embed <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> in a server framework that you choose, or you can use the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> Network Server.
